lead_paragraph: WIESEL--Elie. Kaufman Music Center mourns the loss of Honorary Trustee Elie Wiesel, survivor and witness to the Holocaust who dedicated his life to ensuring that the six million Jewish victims would never be forgotten. Our hearts go out to Marion and their family. May they be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Rosalind Devon, Chairman 1/3
